PropertyList.title: Boeing 707
PropertyList.text:
_______________ Boeing 707-420/430 ___________________
Startup engines:
follow the tutorials or use Autostart
Shutdown engines:
with autostart / shutdown menu
_______________________________________________________ The first 707 for Flightgear was from Innis Cunningham. This version is a revamp of that original. Nearly everthing in 3D models is written and painted new. Also the jsb fdm and the autopilot. For development I have used the BOEING 707 document no. D6-3071-00
